name: Organization Name

leave.description: You are about the leave the organization. After leaving the organization you will not be able to access it again. Are you sure you would like to leave the {{name}} organization?

success.title: You have successfully left the {{name}} organization.
success.description: You will no longer have access to the {{name}} organization.

members.title: Members
members.deleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this member? This action cannot be undone. The user will not be able to join the organization.

invite.title: Invite Organization Members
invite.desc: Each organization member can have different role assigned to authorize certain actions within the organization itself. Organization members can also be added to app teams.
invite.deleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this invitation? This action cannot be undone. The user will not be able to join the organization.

id.title: Organization ID
id.desc: This is your organization's id within your Agnost Cluster.

name.title: Organization Name
name.desc: This is your organization's visible name within the platform. For example, the name of your company or department.

avatar.title: Organization Avatar
avatar.desc: This is the avatar that will be displayed for your organization.

transfer.title: Transfer Organization Ownership
transfer.desc: The organization owner is the person who has created the organization or the person to whom the organization ownership has been transferred. The Owner has full control over the organization and only organization owners can delete the organization or transfer its ownership to someone else.

delete.title: Delete Organization
delete.desc: Permanently remove your Organization and all of its apps and associated app data from deployed environments. This action is not reversible — please continue with caution.

confirm.title: Are you sure to delete your organization?
confirm.desc: All organization apps and managed resource and associated data will be deleted. This action is not reversible — please continue with caution.
confirm.code: Confirm organization delete by typing <confirmCode>{{confirmCode}}</confirmCode> below.

transfer-ownership-desc: The organization owner is the person who has created the organization or the person to whom the organization ownership has been transferred. The Owner has full control over the organization and only organization owners can delete the organization or transfer its ownership to someone else.
transfer-success: You have successfully transferred the ownership.
empty_organization: You’re not a Member of any organization!
empty_organization_desc: Contact your cluster administrator to request access to organizations.
member_delete_success: You have successfully deleted the member from the organization.
invite_delete_success: You have successfully deleted the invitation.
